name: deep enough — a messenger simulator
description:
Story

Emyr came across a post about a private party that will be attended by his crush Jan — a popular internet blogger and model.

To get there, he writes to Rufus, mentioned in the post.

Will Emyr go to a party with Rufus or will he achieve his first goal — Jan...
...or will find something to make him give up both?

Choose what you're doing next: 

text everything that you think is right
or
search for the desired topic and find something interesting.

Get to more than 4 different endings and find them all!

Team

Programming - p41lka
Art - valerie
